ygData.subject: Hey, here.
ygData.msgSnippet: ok, ok, OK! That s enough everyone. The post was written and it s too late to change anything now. But AJ is right to a point, just like everyone else is right

ok, ok, OK!
That's enough everyone.
The post was written and it's too late to change anything now. But AJ is 
right to a point, just like everyone else is right to a point.
I admit myself, since the idea was both mine and AJs in the making, that 
it's wasn't good. And I have no idea why he had to put in all those breast 
words, chest-plate would have been fine and I'v already talked to him about 
it and he admits that it was wrong too.
But Dcoburn, all that was uncalled for. You might not like him and niether 
does Yan, but you didn't have to go that far.
I'v known AJ for a long time now and he's a good person.
And that first post was meant for Yan only, he accidentally sent it into the 
RPG. He said so himself. BUT, even now he doesn't really understand what the 
problem was.
Myself and AJ were only trying to be funny, we didn't know that so many of 
you would hate it. If we would have known he wouldn't have posted it.
And some of you were right, I don't exactly agree with AJs post to the 
group, but all he was trying to say is basically and short:
I didn't know it was wrong and if I did I wouldn't have done it. So please 
stop yelling at me.
He feels very bad about all this.
And I don't like how he snapps back either. I think it's rude. But maybe, 
just maybe if people will take the time to calm down and talk about this 
like proper human beings, and I mean AJ too, maybe we can work this out 
without hurting anyone's feelings.
And without being mean.
I'v already said I'm sorry, it was amistake and I'll never try to be funny 
again. Seriously.
But everyone has to work together here.
